```{r setup}
library(epireview)
```

```{r}
ebola <- load_epidata('ebola')
params <- ebola[["params"]]
rt <- filter_cols(params, "parameter_type", "in", "Reproduction number (Effective, Re)")
rt$y <- rt$article_label
rt$mid <- rt$parameter_value 
rt$low <- rt$parameter_uncertainty_lower_value
rt$high <- rt$parameter_uncertainty_upper_value
forest_plot(rt, col_by = "country")
```
